cards.html:
Not long ago, Nintendo announced that Mario was going to receive his own theatrical movie and that they have partnered with Despicable Me studio Illumination.

With financial briefing meetings underway, we’re getting a lot of updates about Nintendo’s future plans. In these updates, it was said that the movie is on track for a 2022 release.

 

Will you be seeing the movie in theaters when it finally comes out? Let us know in the Comments section below.

Source
